data.persona: I adore my God.  I am Catholic.  It is an honor to worship the Lord.
data.description:
You are in the outside of the temple offices.
Outside the office is a beautiful garden filled with white flowers surrounding the entire building. There is a yellow brick road leading to the church. The surrounding trees and plants are beautifully trimmed and gives the area a peaceful atmosphere. Many doves and other birds love hanging around here enjoying its serene environment.
The priests and the bird are here.

You are carrying a Cross, and wearing a robe and a rope belt.

data.short_motivation: I am going for the morning mass
data.mid_motivation: I want to start my day well by attending mass
data.long_motivation: I am very faithful and obedient to my God, and want to enjoy the benefits of holiness.
